text: Too Many Cooks may refer to: * Too Many Cooks (novel), a 1938 novel by Rex Stout * Too Many Cooks (film), a 1931 American film * "Too Many Cooks" (short), a 2014 Adult Swim short * Too Many Cooks (TV series), an ITV cookery show * "Too Many Cooks", a song originally written by Willie Dixon and recorded by, among others, Mick Jagger with producer John Lennon * "Too Many Cooks", a 1989 episode of Shining Time Station * The idiom "too many cooks spoil the broth", similar to Design by committee
title: Too Many Cooks
